backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining store details, users, categories, products, and authorization-protected CRUD operations with mixins for storage and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a frontend fix for modal history management in ProductDetailModal.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text map summarizing multiple frontend files and their responsibilities across routing, UI, admin pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Defines allowed alternative origins for Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with public and admin routes, layouts, and product detail routing.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Access denied UI showing principal ID with copy and logout actions, clearing auth and React Query cache.
Modal for creating multiple categories from newline‑separated input with preview and auto‑assigned order.
frontend/src/components/CategoriesDropdo: Dropdown that lists categories from API, supports hover/toggle, navigation, and closing on outside click or Escape.
frontend/src/components/CategoryModal.ts: Modal for creating or editing a category with name and order fields and save handling.
frontend/src/components/CookieConsent.ts: Cookie consent banner that stores user preference in localStorage and supports accept, decline, and close animations.
frontend/src/components/DashboardCards.t: Grid of dashboard navigation cards linking to admin sections using icons and gradient backgrounds.
Header with sidebar toggle, title, logout, and a session keep‑alive worker lifecycle manager.
frontend/src/components/DashboardHome.ts: Dashboard landing page showing a title and the main navigation cards.
Overall dashboard layout with header, responsive sidebar, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Simple confirmation dialog component that blocks actions while loading and triggers onConfirm or onClose.
frontend/src/components/DeleteProductDia: Delete dialog requiring a specific password before confirming product deletion, with input handling and loading state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing store info, contact details, social links, and navigation, using store data if available.
frontend/src/components/HeaderSearch.tsx: Header search bar with debounced product search, abortable requests, and redirect to results page.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesD: Fetches and displays product categories with infinite scroll and responsive load limits.
frontend/src/components/home/CategorySec: Renders a category header and its products with a link to view all products in that category.
frontend/src/components/home/ProductCard: Displays a product card with image handling, stock and featured badges, and navigation or selection behavior.
frontend/src/components/home/ProductGrid: Responsive product grid showing a limited number of products depending on screen size.
Renders a badge indicating whether a product is in stock or out of stock.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Full‑screen loading component displaying a spinner and permission‑checking message.
frontend/src/components/LoginInterface.t: Login screen using Internet Identity with a styled button and branding.
frontend/src/components/MobileMenu.tsx: Mobile navigation drawer with category list, scroll lock, escape‑to‑close, and route navigation.
frontend/src/components/pages/AdminUsers: Admin page for managing user roles, including searching, filtering, promoting, and demoting users with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/pages/Categories: UI for listing, filtering, adding, editing, deleting, and reordering categories with react-query mutations and modals.
frontend/src/components/pages/ImportPage: Handles JSON drag-and-drop or file upload to validate and bulk-import products or categories, showing previews, errors, and automatic import execution.
frontend/src/components/pages/ProductsPa: Product management view providing search, filtering, pagination, featured toggles, and CRUD operations using react-query and modals.
frontend/src/components/pages/StoreDetai: Form-driven page to view and update store info, hours, coordinates, and banner image with validation and image compression.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card with image loading fallback, stock badge, and navigation to product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailMod: Modal that displays product details, manages focus, ESC/hardware back handling, scroll locking, and history state for navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailVie: Displays product details including image handling, sharing, WhatsApp contact, and optional back/close controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductModal.tsx: Form modal for creating or editing products with fields, image compression, clipboard helpers, and category selection.
frontend/src/components/PublicHeader.tsx: Public site header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/PublicLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper with header, footer, routed content, and conditional cookie consent.
frontend/src/components/SafeSelect.tsx: Select component enforcing sentinel values to avoid empty-string errors, with helpers for initialization and conversion.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Search bar with debounced queries, autocomplete, full results view, and product detail modal integration.
frontend/src/components/SidebarNavigatio: Sidebar component rendering admin navigation links and handling route changes with active-state styling and mobile overlay.
frontend/src/components/StoreBanner.tsx: Displays a store banner with static imagery and dynamic WhatsApp link populated from store details.
frontend/src/components/Toast.tsx: Toast component managing timed display, pause/resume behavior, icons, and dismissal via a global toast store.
frontend/src/components/ToastContainer.t: Container that renders all active toasts from the toast store.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductDetail.ts: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin status, roles, categories, and products using an actor API with caching and mutation support.
frontend/src/hooks/useToast.ts: Provides helper functions to trigger success, error, warning, and info toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, global styles, and custom toast notification component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRoute.tsx: Route guard that checks authentication and admin status, showing login, loading, or access denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays a category with infinite scrolling products, fetching paginated data and managing local product state.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows store contact details with formatted phone and map links, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page that loads categories with products, handles initial loading, and shows product details in a modal.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy page, fetching store details and displaying static policy sections with scroll-to-top behavior.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information with loading, error, and not-found states, dynamic title updates, and cleanup of product queries.
frontend/src/stores/toastStore.ts: Implements a Zustand store for managing toast notifications, including adding, removing, pausing, and resuming toasts.
frontend/src/utils/ApiResponseHandler.ts: Provides standardized handling of API responses with BigInt parsing, error normalization, and utility functions for constructing API errors.
frontend/src/utils/BigIntSerializer.ts: Offers utilities for safely converting, validating, parsing, and serializing BigInt values in JSON.
frontend/src/utils/NumericConverter.ts: Contains functions for safely converting values to numbers and validating IVA and profit margin values with Spanish locale support.
frontend/src/utils/phoneFormatter.ts: Provides functions to normalize phone numbers for WhatsApp API and format them into Spanish display format.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing handling.
frontend/src/workers/session-worker.js: A web worker that periodically sends keep-alive messages by dispatching synthetic mousemove events.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme customizations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a fix request for ProductDetailModal history handling and related known issues.
